en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Mr FusionExcel Body Building Competition! (1)
en.content:
REPORT BY FusionExcel SPOKESMAN MR. JEAN DANIELS.

FusionExcel International is proud to be the Main Title sponsor for the Mr FusionExcel Body Building competition which was jointly organised by JD427, Fitness One Gym, Ultimate Gym & FusionExcel with the support of the Malaysian Body Building Association. Other sponsors include Carrefour, 1st Endurance, EGO, Dynamax Fitness System and Enzo Kopitiam. 

FusionExcel Manager Mr Patrick Chan presented a mock cheque of RM 73,000 (comprising of cash & product prizes) towards the event which was received on behalf by its organisers Mr. Jean Daniels of JD247 (who is also FusionExcel Spokesman & World Class Golf Long Drive Specialist), Mr Wong Hong of Fitness One Gym (who is also FusionExcel Spokesman & IFBB Mr Asia '99, Mr Eastern USA & New York City 2002) and Mr Malaysia Terry “porky” Gallyot of Ultimate Gym (who is also Heavyweight Mr Asia '99).

The event was held on the 16th of August at the Wangsar Maju Carrefour shopping center. With an estimated 7000 people watching the marathon 9 hour event, it ended up being one on the greatest ever body building events ever held in Malaysia. 

The event started with registration at 10.30am, during which there were special performances from Mohd. Shuhaimi “Dr Freestyle” (World Class Football Juggler) and internationally renown fitness demonstrators (Fitness First GX TEAM).

At different period of the day, the crowds were entertained to the amazing Quantum Pendant demos from FusionExcel top leaders PD Jeffrey Choong, PD James Ng,  & ED Gary Gan. One of the highlights of the event was a demo from FusionExcel Spokesman Bathi Allimuthu (WKA World Kickboxing Champion 2007) and his team which had the crowd ooohhhing and aaahhhing.

A special bench press competition was also held for the crowd where the particpants had to perform as many reps as they could within 1 minute. The competition was eventually won by Imaduddin Alsalti with an amazing 99 reps in 1 minute.

VIP Kamaruzaman (Honorary Secretary of IFBB) kicked off the finals by thanking FusionExcel for their support towards the body building event.

With the press and TV3 and NTV7 in place, the finals started with the Top 10 finalists.  The talent on stage was world class 
and all 7 IFBB qualified judges had a hard time picking the winners. Just before the prize giving, the crowd where entertained by Lilian Tan (Champion INBA Professional Body Builder) who did a guest pose to a thunderous applause.

All prizes were given out by FusionExcel Manager Mr. Patrick Chan & the event organizers Mr. Wong Hong & Mr Malaysia Terry “porky” Gallyot. The Champion title Mr FusionExcel was won by Md Noor Syukri Bin Nasir. 

FusionExcel has set new standard for future body building events. Ahoo! Ahoo!! Ahoo!!!
<Click Here For More Photos>
